mapper.select: select func_key as funcKey, "name", description from functions_tbl;
select count(1) from functions_tbl where func_key = #{funcKey}
select count(1) from m_func_extension mfe inner join extensions_tbl et on et.ex_key = mfe.ex_key where mfe.func_key = #{funcKey} and et.code = #{code}

select
mfe.func_key as funcKey,
et.ex_key as exKey, et.code as code, et.default_yn as defaultYn from extensions_tbl et
inner join m_func_extension mfe on et.ex_key = mfe.ex_key
where 1 = 1
and et.code = #{code}
and et.default_yn = #{defaultYn}
and mfe.func_key = #{funcKey} order by mfe.cre_date
mapper.insert: insert into extensions_tbl (code, default_yn) values (#{code}, false) on conflict (code) do nothing;
